fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Fire a tear at someone attacking them
-(Familiar) Eat a yum heart, making it so if the lead role were to die tonight or tomorrow, they will instead gain an item at random(2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-In your familiar form, you have basic defense
-As the lead, every 2 kills you get will give you one use of a powerful autovest.
Damage: 1 (Basic)
Range: 4
